TopicTitle: Have you ever pressed on the "Credits" button on the main menu?

Articles.Content: I accidentally pressed on it today , the credits are so cool

Yup, a few times.

Edited March 12, 2017 by Alpha_Mike_741

IS there a link to the full music anywhere? I remember a youtuber made a trailer with the full music.

That is one of the most epic pieces of music I have ever heard. It's a shame it cuts off early.
It is probably part of Kevin Macleod's royalty free music collection, just like all other pieces of music in KSP except the main theme. (Harvester did that one himself.)

3 hours ago, Streetwind said:

It is probably part of Kevin Macleod's royalty free music collection, just like all other pieces of music in KSP except the main theme. (Harvester did that one himself.)

I think the Credits theme is actually original.
Just search KSP OST in Youtube and there should be a few of them.

On 3/13/2017 at 6:58 PM, Streetwind said:

It is probably part of Kevin Macleod's royalty free music collection, just like all other pieces of music in KSP except the main theme. (Harvester did that one himself.)

HarvesteR also created that jazz piece (titled Stratejazz) that plays in the VAB/SPH.

The Mission Control, R&D (maybe), Administration Building, Credits, and Title theme are all original pieces. Much or all of the rest of the music is Kevin Macleod music.

Recently they finally made the credits theme long enough to play the whole soundfile instead of cutting off at the end of the credits. It's much more satisfying and we get to hear Kerbal voices.

Edited March 17, 2017 by GregroxMun
